message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone like you, and I'm willing to part with it for $1,350,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. I am willing to pay $1,200,000 for it.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than your current offer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value, I am able to increase my offer to $1,250,000.
